tool.name: Get.relabund
tool.description: Calculate the relative abundance of each otu
tool.command:
echo 'get.relabund( shared=$otu, #if $label: label=${ str($label).replace(",","-") }, #end if #if $groups: groups=${ str($groups).replace(",","-") }, #end if scale=$scale )' | sed 's/ //g' ## mothur trips over whitespace | mothur &&
## move output files to correct destination prefix="$otu" && mv mothur.*.logfile "$logfile" && mv \${prefix%.dat}*.relabund "$relabund"

param.name: otu
param.label: shared - OTU Shared
param.help: Use Make.shared to create a shared file from a list and a group file

tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
**Command Documenation**
The get.relabund_ command calculates the relative abundance of each otu in a sample from a shared_ file. It outputs a .relabund_ file.
.. _shared: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Shared_file .. _get.relabund: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Get.relabund
v.1.21.0: Updated to Mothur 1.33
